bill.title: Partisan Judicial Elections; authorize.
bill.description: An Act To Repeal Sections 23-15-974 Through 23-15-985, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For The Nonpartisan Judicial Election Act; To Reenact Sections 23-15-845, 23-15-847, 23-15-971, 23-15-997, 23-15-1013 And 9-9-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For The Election Of Judges In Party Primaries, And Which Were Repealed In 1994; To Amend Sections 9-4-5, 9-4-15, 9-5-29, 9-5-36, 9-5-50, 9-5-58, 9-7-11, 9-7-27, 9-7-46, 9-7-51, 23-15-197, 23-15-297, 23-15-359, 23-15-367, 23-15-801, 23-15-807, 23-15-973, 23-15-993, 23-15-995 And 23-15-1015, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Preceding Sections; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Judiciary A;Apportionment and Elections
